channel.title: How to create minecraft webclient?
channel.description:
Hello. I am looking to find out how to create a minecraft web client that i can use on my gaming forums. I would like it to be forced to only be able to do one thing. Select your username and then be logged into my cracked server.
I would like this to be so that people dont have to download anything in order to play my cracked server and they can play it directly on my gaming site.
I have seen something like this before on a webclient only it was the full game on the browser. Now that website has iframed in the minecraft.net client cause they had to remove it from there website.
I would like to have this again for my site. Thanks

item.dc:creator: @alex809 alex809
